attributes.documentation: @title The Controller interface provides access to an external list of controllers.

attributes.documentation: @title Controller stores a list of controller addresses that can be used for authentication in other contracts.
attributes.name: Controller

attributes.documentation:
@title Ownable has an owner address and provides basic authorization control functions.
 This contract is modified version of the MIT OpenZepplin Ownable contract 
 This contract doesn't allow for multiple changeOwner operations
 https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-solidity/blob/master/contracts/ownership/Ownable.sol
attributes.name: Ownable

attributes.documentation: @dev Constructor sets the original owner of the contract and whether or not it is one time transferable.
@dev Reverts if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a new address.
 @param _account address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "owner cannot be set to zero address"

attributes.type: literal_string "owner cannot be set to zero address"
attributes.value: owner cannot be set to zero address

attributes.name: renounceOwnership

attributes.documentation: @return the address of the owner.
attributes.name: owner

attributes.documentation: @return true if the ownership is transferable.
attributes.name: isTransferable

attributes.documentation: @return true if sender is the owner of the contract.
attributes.name: _isOwner
